title: Dentifrice

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a dentifrice, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of the dentifrice of our design;
FIG. 2 is a left side elevation, the right side being a mirror image thereof.
FIG. 3 is a front elevation view, the rear elevation view being a mirror image thereof; and,
FIG. 4 is a top plan view, the bottom plan view being a mirror image thereof.
The broken lines showing of a toothbrush and a tube in FIG. 1 are for illustrative purposes only and form no part of the claimed design.
